scripts.staging:delete-tag: git fetch --tags && git push origin --delete $(git tag -l 'vue3-nuxt3-conventions-*') || true && git fetch origin --prune 'refs/tags/*:refs/tags/*'
scripts.staging:deploy: yarn staging:delete-tag && TAG=`echo vue3-nuxt3-conventions-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)` && git tag $TAG && git push origin $TAG
